artist: Author: Geoffroy Tory; Translator: Translated and annotated by George B. Ives; Designer: Bruce Rogers; Printer: William Edwin Rudge (Firm); Publisher: The Grolier Club
creditline: The Frank P. Leslie Collection, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Frank P. Leslie in memory of Mr. and Mrs. John Leslie
inscription: Inscribed in black ink on printer's acknowledgement page [p. 209]: Ex Libris / Ronald Lane Latimer / The Alcertis Press
life_date: Geoffroy Tory, Author, French, c. 1480–1533; Translated and annotated by George B. Ives, Translator, American, 1856–1930; Bruce Rogers, Designer, American, 1870–1957; William Edwin Rudge (Firm), Printer, Mount Vernon, New York; The Grolier Club, Publisher, New York
markings:
Bookplate affixed to inside front cover: M. Weiss.
Bookseller's label affixed to inside back cover: Philip C. Duschines / RARE BOOKS / 757 MADISON AVE / NEW YORK 21, N.Y.
provenance: (Phillip C. Duchines Rare Books, New York, [bookseller label]). Ronald Lane Latimer  of Alcertis Press, New York (handwritten inscription). M. Weiss (bookplate). Frank P. Leslie, Wayzata, Minn., by 1963; given to MIA, 1967.
title: Champ Fleury
